name: Tomato Complex
description:
This roguelike(-ish?) will be my entry for the 7DRL 2023 contest.

You play a tomato exploring a strange world.

-

You can use mouse, keypad or joypad to control your tomato.

Though you should just use keypad, because the other controllers are quite buggy.

-

The rules are :

- Enter a portal to go to the next stage.

- You have to complete 20 stages to win the game.

- There are 3 types of interaction with objects :

   - Talking to

   - Pushing

   - Fighting

- Picking up a tomato slice will increase your level.

- Fighting an opponent will decrease your level.

- If the player's level gets too low (<1) or too high (>20), the game is over.

It's far from finished, but I'm happy with it. I learned a lot, as it was the first time I made a 3D game. ^^
